A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't think almost any of the characters acted their parts. Felt like a mishmash of jokes & too many plot twists shoved into the story\, just so they could say they were put in there.  It created a jumbled story with tons of plot holes. And I felt all of the actors were way out of character. \nOver all\, its my second least favorite of the Star Wars films.
